answers.answer: But I'm still really small for 6 months everyone says
It can cause gestational diabetes. I'm 34 weeks and I've gained 40 pounds but I'm retaining a lot of water. Are you bloating at all?

If you gain too much you could develop gestational diabetes and also at risk for preeclampsia. You're total weight gain should be determined by your start weight. I.e. if you start at 120lbs or so you can gain more weight (& be ok) than a woman who starts out at a higher weight.

if your dr is conserned ask them how you can help slow down the weight gain. if they are not tgen dont worry to much about it. i gained 60 with my 1st and that was only in a matter of about 3-4 months. i didny find out till 5 months i was pregnant.

Thanks ! I started off at 117 pounds now I'm 137 . My doctor didn't really say too much about the weight gain besides if I keep up what I'm doing I'll gain around 50 pounds total. Every appointment before my last she said my weight gain was normal. I like to snack a lot but I didn't think I was doing it that much
I kinda feel like I've been bloating but not really

So, you've actually only gained 20 pounds hon.  :>)  (137 minus 117 is 20).The issue with gaining too much weight also makes it harder on you when the baby is born.  You are tired, busy, and stretched too thin as it is and to lose a huge amount of weight after baby is born is difficult.  that's when you hear of someone struggling for a couple of years to get rid of that baby weight.good luck

Im 34 weeks & gained 42 pounds already! My doctor isnt concerned she said becuase my weight wasnt to big before pregnancy 135lbs that i am ok , but you cant even tell i put on all that weight its just my thighs well butt & belly! Sometimes i get overwhellmed when the nurses ask me to stand on the scale but hey pregnancy does crazy things to your body
It really just depends at wat weight you start at. I'm 25 weeks today n I've gained 3 pounds but I started at 158.

question: Is there any bad side affects to gaining too much weight? I'm 6 months and my doctor said I've gained 30 pounds ,anyone else ?
title: weight
